title: Asia Fitness Conference 2022
description: GENERAL INFORMATION AFC 2022 For the 12th year, the Asia Fitness Conference (AFC) will be held at BITEC. AFC continues to educate and inspire fitness professionals from around the region. This edition we will focus on “Back Together Again”. It is the place for Asia’s fitness community to be inspired by world-renowned fitness educators, to network with regional leaders, to share ideas and experiences as well as to celebrate being part of the growing, prospering and rapidly changing fitness industry in Asia. Join national and international fitness professionals, club and studio owners/managers, healthcare professionals and leading brands in the industry and experience more than 140 cutting-edge education sessions, networking and business opportunities in Asia’s best fitness conference! Anyone interested in joining us in 2022 as a delegate, exhibitor or sponsor, please contact us at: [email protected]
